auto_place.label: Auto place order [DEV]
auto_place.comment: If You set no you will confirm every order

create_customer.label: Register customer
create_customer.comment: Register customers during placing order. They can check order status online.

override_shipping_rate.label: Override shipping rate
override_shipping_rate.comment: Use Allegro rate instead original carrier rate

text_color.label: Text color
text_color.comment: HTML text color for default template

template_localization.label: Defaults: Location
template_localization.fields:
Country Set "Neverland" for Testwebapi.pl select orbaallegro/adminhtml_system_config_country orbaallegro/system_config_source_attribute_template_country 50 1 1 1
Province (Poland) select orbaallegro/system_config_source_attribute_template_province 60 1 1 1
-->
City text 80 1 1 1 required-entry
Post code text 85 1 1 1 required-entry

count.label: How many images
count.comment: By system sortorder. Includes main main photo.

shipping_pay_seller_price.label: Seller pay for shipping if item price greater that
shipping_pay_seller_price.comment: Insert minimal price or leave empty

first_item_pickpoint_after_prepaid_paczk.label: Pickpoint after prepaid - Paczka24 pickpoint (first item)

next_item_pickpoint_after_prepaid_paczka.label: Pickpoint after prepaid - Paczka24 pickpoint (next item)

item_count_pickpoint_after_prepaid_paczk.label: Pickpoint after prepaid - Paczka24 pickpoint (item count)

debug_mode.label: Debug mode
debug_mode.comment: In debug mode, external errors and whole transfered data will be logged into log files

unhandled_item_count.label: Unhandled Item Count Mode
unhandled_item_count.comment: Use Ajax Loader (Use for better Database Performance)
